definitions.definition: The resins of the tree Aquilaria malaccensis (syn. Aquilaria agallocha ), known for their fragrant aroma, produced after infection by the fungus Phialophora parasitica .
Any plant of the large and variable genus Aloe .
Misnomer for any large, vaguely aloe-like plant, such as Agave
A strong, bitter drink made from the juice of such plants, used as a purgative.

main_definition: ( in the plural ) The resins of the tree Aquilaria malaccensis (syn. Aquilaria agallocha ), known for their fragrant aroma, produced after infection by the fungus Phialophora parasitica .
secondary_definitions: Any plant of the large and variable genus Aloe .
Misnomer for any large, vaguely aloe-like plant, such as Agave
A strong, bitter drink made from the juice of such plants, used as a purgative.
